Text:
You have the right to request information about what personal information AARP has about you, including:
What personal information was collected,
What personal information was used,
What personal information was shared in the last 12 months
What personal information was sold in the last 12 months, and
the purpose of the above activities.
Label: Description of Right to Know PI Collected

Text: Opt-out of Sale or Sharing of Your Personal Information\nYou have the right to request that AARP not sell or share your personal information to third parties.

Text: LIMIT PROCESSING OF SENSITIVE INFORMATION THAT AARP MAY HAVE ABOUT YOU â€“ RIGHT TO LIMIT\nYou have the right to request that AARP limit the processing of sensitive personal information AARP may have about you.

Text: Delete\nYou have the right to request the deletion of your personal information.
Label: Description of Right to Delete
